sentences.en: a house with a wide porch in front.
sentences.cn: 正面有宽阔门廊的房子。

sentences.en: He has been brought up not to swear in front of women.
sentences.cn: 他从小就被教育不要在女性面前说脏话。

sentences.en: He stepped in front of her, barring her way.
sentences.cn: 他走到她前面，挡住了她的去路。

sentences.en: He tipped the table over in front of him.
sentences.cn: 他把面前的桌子打翻了。

sentences.en: He wore an old sweater with a coffee stain down the front.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一件旧毛衣，前面有一道咖啡渍。

sentences.en: I wanted the front garden to be a blaze of colour.
sentences.cn: 我想让门前的花园变得五彩缤纷。

sentences.en: Richard Dunwoody is in front in the jockeys' title race.
sentences.cn: 理查德·邓伍迪在职业赛马骑师冠军赛中领先其他选手。

sentences.en: Ricky stepped forward to the front of the stage and began to sing.
sentences.cn: 里基走到舞台的最前面，开始唱了起来。

sentences.en: Rue Guynemer begins at the front of the Fitzgerald site.
sentences.cn: 吉内梅街始于菲茨拉德故居前。

sentences.en: She threatened to throw herself in front of a train.
sentences.cn: 她威胁要卧轨。

sentences.en: She was only six and still missing her front teeth.
sentences.cn: 她才6岁，门牙还没长出来。

sentences.en: the car in front stopped suddenly.
sentences.cn: 前面的汽车突然停下了。

sentences.en: The car pulled in and double-parked in front of the town hall.
sentences.cn: 车在市政大厅前靠边并排停下了。

sentences.en: the dog’s front legs
sentences.cn: 狗的前腿

sentences.en: the front cover of ‘Hello!’ magazine
sentences.cn: 《Hello!》杂志的封面

sentences.en: The front door is locked and all the windows are firmly shut.
sentences.cn: 前门锁上了，所有窗户都关严了。

sentences.en: The front room was strewn with books and clothes.
sentences.cn: 起居室里到处都是书和衣服。

sentences.en: The front row of soldiers were mown down by machinegun fire.
sentences.cn: 最前面的一排士兵被机枪火力扫射倒了。

sentences.en: the front wheel of his bicycle
sentences.cn: 他自行车的前轮

sentences.en: the lawn in front of the house.
sentences.cn: 房前的草坪。

sentences.en: The tall man in the front blindfolded me.
sentences.cn: 前面的高个子男人挡住了我的视线。

sentences.en: the teacher didn't want his authority challenged in front of the class.
sentences.cn: 教师不想让他的权威在全班学生面前受到挑战。

sentences.en: They used to kiss and cuddle in front of everyone.
sentences.cn: 他们过去经常在人前搂抱亲吻。

sentences.en: Three burly toughs elbowed their way to the front.
sentences.cn: 三个膀粗腰圆的恶汉挤到了前面。

sentences.en: Two of his front teeth had been knocked out.
sentences.cn: 他有两颗门牙被打落了。

sentences.en: two station wagons stopped out front.
sentences.cn: 两辆客货两用车停在外面。

sentences.en: Wayne has a large white coffee in front of him.
sentences.cn: 韦恩面前摆着一大杯加了牛奶的咖啡。

sentences.en: You see studs on lots of London front doors.
sentences.cn: 在伦敦，你能看到许多人家的大门上都装有饰钉。

sentences.en: You'd better keep well behind the car in front in case it suddenly stops.
sentences.cn: 你最好与前面的车保持相当的距离，以防它突然停下来。

phrases.tran_cn: 前厅；管理部门；全体决策人员
(主北美)在前面；在前方，在外面；在门外
统一战线，统战；联合阵线，联合作战

trans.tran_en: at, on, or in the front of something
if a building or area of land is fronted by something, or fronts onto it, it faces that thing

trans.tran_cn: 前面，临街的一面，身体前部，海滨道，战争前线，阵线，假面具，幌子，（冷暖空气团接触的）锋
trans.tran_en: the part of something that is furthest forward in the direction that it is facing or moving
the part of something that is furthest forward in the direction that it is facing or moving
the part of something that is furthest forward in the direction that it is facing or moving

trans.tran_cn: 面对，领导，作为…的主唱/主持
trans.tran_en: if a building or area of land is fronted by something, or fronts onto it, it faces that thing
